docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 27 (AP) -- The Senate confirmed by voice vote today President Kennedy's nomination of U. Alexis Johnson of California as Deputy Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 27 (AP) -- The Senate confirmed by voice vote today President Kennedy's nomination of U. Alexis Johnson of California as Deputy Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs.

headline.main: SENATE CONFIRMS FIVE; Aide in State Department and 4 Ambassadors Approved

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 26 -- The landings in Cuba and President Kennedy's strong policy statements concerning Communist infiltration in Latin America are forcing Uruguayans to split into three groups. These are the pro-Castro group, the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 26 -- The landings in Cuba and President Kennedy's strong policy statements concerning Communist infiltration in Latin America are forcing Uruguayans to split into three groups. These are the pro-Castro group, the anti-Castro group and those who disapprove of Dr. Castro but disapprove more of the United States.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Foreign exchange market was relatively quiet during the past week. British pound sterling followed an irregular course while the Canadian dollar maintained a firm undertone for most of the sessions.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 4 -- The United States sees the battle against poverty as the "real issue" in the Western Hemisphere, Secretary of State Dean Rusk said today. This issue, he added, is one "not to be confused with Sino-Soviet penetration" in Cuba.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 4 -- The United States sees the battle against poverty as the "real issue" in the Western Hemisphere, Secretary of State Dean Rusk said today. This issue, he added, is one "not to be confused with Sino-Soviet penetration" in Cuba.
